author: Blackmore, Richard, Sir, d. 1729.
notes: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
An attack in verse on the so-called "wits" of the time, Dryden and others, for their grossness and impiety.
Part of names left blank in text have been supplied in manuscript.
Attributed to Richard Blackmore. cf. BM.
keywords: English wit and humor --  Early works to 1800.
